SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, BOARD_COUNT,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_C_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_C_DATE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "REPLY" R WHERE R.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND R.REPLY_ST = 'N') REPLY_COUNT,
(SELECT BOARD_FILE_PATH || BOARD_FILE_RENAME FROM BOARD_FILE F WHERE F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) THUMBNAIL
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN "CATEGORY" USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE BOARD_ST = 'N' AND CATEGORY_NO = ${categoryNo} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NAME, BOARD_COUNT, BOARD_ST,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - BOARD_C_DATE) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(BOARD_C_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END BOARD_C_DATE,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM "REPLY" C WHERE C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO AND C.REPLY_ST = 'N') REPLY_COUNT
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE (BOARD_ST = 'N' OR BOARD_ST = 'D') AND CATEGOTY_NO = ${boardCode} ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
